sentence: And Rep. Liz Cheney, R-Wyo., who is serving on the Democratic-led House committee investigating the Jan. 6 attack on the Capitol, is in danger of losing a primary to Trump-endorsed Harriet Hageman.
title: Inside Trump's secretive endorsement operation

sentence: It's roughly 10 times as much as her Trump-backed primary challenger Harriet Hageman drew.
title: With Liz Cheney's re-election prospects in doubt, her national profile grows

sentence: McCarthy has thrown his political weight behind Harriet Hageman, a Trump-backed congressional candidate who is challenging Cheney in Wyoming -- an endorsement that earned him plaudits on the right, a key constituency in a potential future bid for the speaker's gavel.
author: Melanie Zanona
title: McCarthy calls endorsement of Cheney's primary foe a 'special case'

sentence: And two congressional challengers whom Thiel has also supported -- Joe Kent in Washington and Harriet Hageman in Wyoming -- have mounted competitive bids against incumbent Republicans who voted to impeach former President Trump.
author: Gabby Orr and Michael Warren
title: Peter Thiel plans to wind down his involvement in 2022 after Vance's victory in Ohio
